title: Zoo: Name a Cockroach After Your Ex, And We’ll Feed it to a Predator
subtitle: Participants can reportedly watch the vindictively-themed feeding in real-time.
author: Madison Dapcevich
vclaim: As part of its annual fundraiser, San Antonio Zoo in Texas is offering scorned lovers the chance to name a cockroach or rodent after their ex before it is fed to a larger animal.
